review.comment: My google page had only 2 reviews. after i started working w/Seth and Vine Concepts, in under a month, I was able to get to double digit reviews, which has undoubtedly helped get me more calls this month. So glad I decided to start working with the team here... highly recommend if you need help with your online reviews!

Right from the jump I knew my decision to work with Seth & Vine Concepts would be a good one.

They onboarded me fast & easy, and they delivered pretty much exactly what they said they would, when they said they would do it.

They allowed me to just focus simply on my own business, because they made it easy to trust that they were perfectly handling the SEO stuff.

That's exactly what you want from an SEO company, and from all the ones I've worked with before Vine Concepts, they definitely have set a new benchmark.
review.review_reply: Sam – amazing! Glad we've been able to exceed your expectations and allow you to focus on what's important – YOUR business, and let us handle the SEO :) Cheers

Dale,

Thanks for sharing your experience with us.

It's greatly appreciated!

review.comment:
These past couple months have proved to be an extremely challenging time for my business and I, but Seth and his team have been there trying to help us weather the storm, positioning us to prepare for the move forward as we move past this whole pandemic.

Thank you guys for the constant support and availability during the rough times.
review.review_reply: Thanks Cheryl, glad we were able to make a difference in your business during these hard times!

review.comment:
Seth has been awesome to work with ... I played around with SEO a bit before realizing I needed to focus my time elsewhere and hire an SEO company, and worked with a couple pretty cruddy ones before meeting Seth and I can tell you that Vine Concepts is the real deal.

I always felt safe, and in the know with what was going on with my site, and the journey from a little bit of traffic, to consistent traffic & calls has been great. Thanks a bunch.
review.review_reply:
Jason,
This means a lot! Thanks for letting us handle your SEO for you :)

review.comment:
they are killing it with my reputation management campaign. I've had several spam / BS reviews from angry competitors on yelp removed with the assistance of Vine Concepts

#ThankYou
review.review_reply:
Andrew,
It's been a pleasure allowing the real "you" to shine on yelp so that others know just how awesome you and your business are. Keep it up!
Thank you!

review.comment: Seth was really willing to demonstrate the results he can get for me and my websites and be super open about how he achieves top results, moreso than a lot of other companies I've worked with out there doing digital marketing... That really made it easy to get into his mind, pick his brain a bit, and really understand and trust what we're working on.
review.review_reply: Wow thanks James! Glad to hear you like our client approach!

review.comment: Wow, I thought I enjoyed the websites I made, but there's just something about the way Seth combines the use of colors, space, and font that creates an extremely slick and modern website... Fast loading time, optimized for mobile. As a developer, I can say this stuff is top notch & I'll be back for more.
review.review_reply: Appreciate it Mike. Glad you like my style 🤙🏿

review.comment: Came across Vine Concepts the other day, and while I didn't have the budget to conduct a full out campaign to rank higher in Google for a couple of my sites, Seth was able to conduct a one-off campaign for each of my sites and set me up real well, so that the site is properly optimized, with all the necessary info and infrastructure to build a more formal campaign when the time is right!
review.review_reply: Thanks Mike! Glad we could help you and feel excited to revisit your two websites at a future date!

review.comment: Wow, little did I know just how little I knew about making sure my website gets visitors. I knew that I needed to have content for my brand for the readers to read that provides value, but I didn't know much about making sure my website was set up properly for my target readers to actually find it. Crazy. Anyways, all that matters right now is we are growing month over month thanks to Seth, and his very straightforward approach to building up our brand.
review.review_reply: Thanks Jean :) It's been awesome seeing the growth of your site since we began working together.
Thank you for the 5* rating!

review.comment:
Back in April of 2017, I started working with Seth on a campaign for a small fashion blog I had just started, and we grew organic traffic from under 100 visitors per month, to nearly 800 in just two months time!

Since then, I've recommended Seth to several friends of mine, and he's continued to deliver the same level of excellence. Hire Seth & Vine Concepts if you want the best SEO company out there.
review.review_reply: Thanks Lucy, it's been awesome helping your site grow over the past year-plus :)

review.comment:
I live in NYC and I've done some small SEO work with Seth & Vine Concepts over the past year that has went really well, so I wanted to pass along his company to do work with Broadway Exterminating -- also in NYC -- because they had expressed a desire to me to reach new customers when they came to my apartment a while back.

A conditional of my referral was that I'd be kept in the loop as to the progress of the campaign, because when I make a referral, I want to be sure I'm referring a QUALITY service, and all I have to say is that Seth's NY SEO company has made me look GOOD!

Thank you Seth for being such a great SEO partner to me, and other companies I recommend you to now, and in the future, across New York City.
review.review_reply:
Sam, It's been a pleasure working with you over the past year, and I thank you greatly for the referrals & your continued partnership.

- Seth

review.comment: Vine Concepts and Seth have helped propel our company through tedious re-branding, junk link corrections, site optimization and general "best practice" consultations. I highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the review John. It's much appreciated. It was a pleasure working with you.

review.comment: A passionate, reliable agency that really cares about the success of it's clients not just taking their money. I gem for any small business! A+++
review.review_reply: Thanks Jose. Appreciate the kind words.

review.comment: Seth really helped me grow my business. He took the time and explained exactly what he was going to do , what the costs were going to  be and what I would get out of it. I would not hesitate to do it again if i had too. I recommend his service to any business owner.
review.review_reply: Thanks Michael. I'm glad you're happy with the results we were able to give your business.

review.comment: Utilizing Vine and Seth brought my business to new levels. I am getting more and more leads every day. And I have even had to hire more staff. I couldn't ask for a better service.
review.review_reply: I'm glad we were able to help you grow!

review.comment:
Great company to deal with.

Seth and the guys at Vine Concepts were able to not only deliver what they had promised but also exceeded my timeframe.

Thanks Seth.
review.review_reply: Glad we could deliver prompt results!

review.comment: This guy knows his what it takes to gain exposure in the digital world. It's not easy to stay on top of things in this industry, but he continuously stays ahead of the game with the most up-to-date techniques. If you are in need of a SEO or Digital Marketing campaign, Seth is your guy.
review.review_reply: Thanks Matt, I appreciate your support!

review.comment: I've had the pleasure of working on projects with Seth in the past. He has a wealth of SEM experience, and his passion for digital marketing is evident in the results he achieves for his clients.
review.review_reply: Thanks David. I'm happy you can see the effort I put into my campaigns!

review.comment: Vine Concepts helped my company with search marketing on multiple occasions. From devising an effective PPC campaign to helping my business become more visible by being ranked highly in the search engines, I can always rely on Vine Concepts.
review.review_reply: Thanks Matt! Glad your rankings have stuck!
